verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai, <WH5514> in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> of the second <WH8145> year <WH8141> after they had come out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> saying, <WH559>
"Moreover let the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> keep <WH6213> the Passover <WH6453> in its appointed season. <WH4150>

On the fourteenth <WH702> day <WH3117> of this month, <WH2320> at evening, <WH6153> you shall keep <WH6213> it in its appointed season <WH4150>â€”according to all its statutes, <WH2708> and according to all its ordinances, <WH4941> you shall keep it. <WH6213>"
Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that they should keep <WH6213> the Passover. <WH6453>

They kept <WH6213> the Passover <WH6453> in the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> on the fourteenth <WH702> day <WH3117> of the month, <WH6153> at evening, in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai. <WH5514> According to all that Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses, <WH4872> so the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did. <WH6213>

There were certain men, <WH582> who were unclean <WH2931> because of the dead body <WH5315> of a man, <WH120> so that they could <WH3201> not keep <WH6213> the Passover <WH6453> on that day, <WH3117> and they came <WH7126> before <WH6440> Moses <WH4872> and before <WH6440> Aaron <WH175> on that day. <WH3117>

Those <WH1992> men <WH582> said <WH559> to him, <WH2931> "We are unclean because of the dead body <WH5315> of a man. <WH120> Why are we kept back, <WH1639> that we may not offer <WH7126> the offering <WH7133> of Yahweh <WH3068> in its appointed season <WH4150> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel? <WH3478>"
Moses <WH4872> answered <WH559> them, <WH5975> "Wait, that I may hear <WH8085> what Yahweh <WH3068> will command concerning you. <WH6680>"
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Say <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> <WH376> 'If any man <WH376> of you or of your generations <WH1755> is unclean <WH2931> by reason of a dead body, <WH5315> or is on a journey <WH1870> far away, <WH7350> he shall still keep <WH6213> the Passover <WH6453> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

In the second <WH8145> month, <WH2320> on the fourteenth <WH702> day <WH3117> at evening <WH6153> they shall keep <WH6213> it; <WH398> they shall eat it with unleavened bread <WH4682> and bitter herbs. <WH4844>
They shall leave <WH7604> none of it until the morning, <WH1242> nor break <WH7665> a bone <WH6106> of it. <WH2708> According to all the statute of the Passover <WH6453> they shall keep it. <WH6213>

But the man <WH376> who is clean, <WH2889> and is not on a journey, <WH1870> and fails <WH2308> to keep <WH6213> the Passover, <WH6453> that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH5971> Because he didn't <WH7126> offer the offering <WH7133> of Yahweh <WH3068> in its appointed season, <WH4150> that man <WH376> shall bear <WH5375> his sin. <WH2399>

<WH1616>"'If a foreigner lives <WH1481> among you, <WH6213> and desires to keep the Passover <WH6453> to Yahweh; <WH3068> according to the statute <WH2708> of the Passover, <WH6453> and according to its ordinance, <WH2708> so shall he do. <WH6213> You shall have one <WH259> statute, <WH2708> both for the foreigner, <WH1616> and for him who is born <WH249> in the land. <WH776>'"

On the day <WH3117> that the tabernacle <WH4908> was raised up, <WH6965> the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> the tabernacle, <WH4908> even the Tent <WH4908> of the Testimony: <WH5715> and at evening <WH6153> it was over the tabernacle <WH4908> as it were the appearance <WH4758> of fire, <WH784> until morning. <WH1242>
So it was continually. <WH8548> The cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> it, <WH4758> and the appearance of fire <WH784> by night. <WH3915>

Whenever <WH6310> the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927> from over the Tent, <WH168> then after <WH310> that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> traveled; <WH5265> and in the place <WH4725> where the cloud <WH6051> remained, <WH7931> there the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> encamped. <WH2583>

At the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh, <WH3068> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> traveled, <WH5265> and at the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> they encamped. <WH2583> As long as <WH3117> the cloud <WH6051> remained <WH7931> on the tabernacle <WH4908> they remained encamped. <WH2583>

When the cloud <WH6051> stayed <WH748> on the tabernacle <WH4908> many <WH7227> days, <WH3117> then the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> kept <WH8104> Yahweh <WH3068>'s command, <WH4931> and didn't <WH5265> travel.

Sometimes <WH3426> the cloud <WH6051> was a few <WH4557> days <WH3117> on the tabernacle; <WH4908> then according to the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> they remained encamped, <WH2583> and according to the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> they traveled. <WH5265>

Sometimes <WH3426> the cloud <WH6051> was from evening <WH6153> until morning; <WH1242> and when the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927> in the morning, <WH1242> they traveled: <WH5265> or by day <WH3119> and by night, <WH3915> when the cloud <WH6051> was taken up, <WH5927> they traveled. <WH5265>

Whether it was two days, <WH3117> or a month, <WH2320> or a year <WH3117> that the cloud <WH6051> stayed <WH748> on the tabernacle, <WH4908> remaining <WH7931> on it, <WH1121> the children of Israel <WH3478> remained encamped, <WH2583> and didn't <WH5265> travel; but when it was taken up, <WH5927> they traveled. <WH5265>

At the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> they encamped, <WH2583> and at the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> they traveled. <WH5265> They kept <WH8104> Yahweh <WH3068>'s command, <WH4931> at the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> by <WH3027> Moses. <WH4872>
